title: How many companies are there in Surat? - Quora

response.answer_text: This type of information may be achieved from some authentic institutions like GIDC, EPFO, MINISTRY OF EMPLOYMENT…or some survey institutions who can have the exact data. As per my knowledge, there are so many textile related and supporting industrial units in Surat. So many textile markets, so many transport companies, Besides these, diamond units, apparel units, jewellery park and other companies are there in Surat and nearby areas of Udhana, Sachin, Bhestan, Ichhapor, Kadodara, Palsana,… There are giant industries also in Surat viz ONGC, RELIANCE, L&T, KRIBHCO, GSEG, GUJARAT GAS, ESSAR, SHELL, NTPC, BRC,
